comments.en:
Dye-sublimation photo printer in A4 size (8x12in/21x30cm). 314 dpi, full 24-bit color depth (256 levels per CMY color component), laminate overcoating, full-bleed (border-less). Produces laboratory-like photos. Does not print on normal paper, so it is not suitable for documents, it is only for photos. USB 1.1 connection.

Direct printing from PictBridge-compatible cameras or from flash cards (of any DPOF-capable camera) possible. Photos on the cards can be shown and selected on an 1.8inch LCD monochrome display or on a TV set.

Consumables/Refills: Packs with special paper and three-color ribbon
